foreignData.name: Phantom-Tiger
foreignData.text:
Der Phantom-Tiger kommt mit zwei +1/+1-Marken ins Spiel.
Falls dem Phantom-Tiger Schaden zugefügt werden würde, verhindere diesen Schaden. Entferne eine +1/+1-Marke vom Phantom-Tiger.

foreignData.name: Tigre fantasma
foreignData.text:
El Tigre fantasma entra en juego con dos contadores +1/+1 sobre él.
Si se le fuera a hacer daño al Tigre fantasma, prevén ese daño. Remueve un contador +1/+1 del Tigre fantasma.

foreignData.name: Tigre fantomatique
foreignData.text:
Le Tigre fantomatique arrive en jeu avec deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur lui.
Si des blessures devaient être infligées au Tigre fantomatique, prévenez ces blessures. Retirez un marqueur +1/+1 du Tigre fantomatique.

foreignData.name: Tigre Fantasma
foreignData.text:
La Tigre Fantasma entra in gioco con due segnalini +1/+1 su di essa.
Se viene inflitto danno alla Tigre Fantasma, previeni quel danno. Rimuovi un segnalino +1/+1 dalla Tigre Fantasma.

foreignData.name: Tigre Fantasma
foreignData.text:
Tigre Fantasma entra em jogo com dois marcadores +1/+1 sobre ele.
Se algum dano fosse causado a Tigre Fantasma, previna aquele dano. Remova um marcador +1/+1 de Tigre Fantasma.

name: Phantom Tiger
originalText:
Phantom Tiger comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.

rulings.text: The damage prevention ability works even if it has no counters, as long as some effect keeps its toughness above zero.
If this card takes damage from multiple sources at once (for example if it is blocked by multiple creatures in combat), it only loses one counter.
If unpreventable damage is applied to this card, you still remove a counter even though the prevention fails.
Remove one counter each time it would be damaged. If it was going to take more than one point of damage, you prevent all the damage and still only remove one counter.

text:
Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.
